resources.string: Indian Law Mobile Library : Indian Bare Acts in mobile

Indian Law Mobile Library is an innovative new generation mobile application to access Indian Bare Acts in mobile on the go without network connection. 
You can avail this app in http://market.android.com/details?id=com.mobilex.lawmobilelibrary.activities
For more details call +91 8754542929 from 10 a.m to 6 p.m. 
Thank you.

Law Mobile Library is an innovative new generation mobile phone Law Application to access certain Indian Bare Acts in mobile phone. This Software contains about 71 important Central Acts which can be referred in seconds without any network connection. This Software is intended for a quick and easy reference of Indian Acts. It will be a ready reconnoitre to the Judicial Officers, Advocates and other Legal Professionals.

For more details visit www.mobilex.co.in

Concept by Madras High Court Advocates:

P.M.Shahul Hameed M.A., B.L.


K.Sivasubramanian M.A., B.L.,


You are most welcome to provide us with your feedback.

Our mail id: mobilexforyou@gmail.com

Website: www.mobilex.co.in.

This software product is licenced to you on \"As-is-where-is\" basis, subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement for your personal use only.

5.While releasing this software product every effort has been taken in avoiding any errors, omissions or insertions. This is to be stated that the Author shall not be made liable for any erroneous action or inaction creeping in despite our best efforts.
6.It is suggested that to avoid any doubt the user should cross-check all the facts, law and contents of the Application with original Government Publication or notification. All disputes are subject to the jurisdiction of competent courts in Chennai only.

contact us :
Website: www.mobilex.co.in
Email: mobilexforyou@gmail.com
Voice: +91

Procedure for activating the Application:
Click \'Activate\' and then \'Get Activation Code\' options.
Click \'yes\' to allow the application to send text message, it sends request for activation code from your mobile to the App. provider.
Then our Marketing representative or Customer Care Officer will Contact you to provide details about App. charge and mode of payment for the Activation code.
Once you paid the fee for the Activation code, we will send the Code by SMS or email within 24 hrs.
Enter the provided Code in Enter activation code option and press Activate. Happy access all Acts.

In this free version, you can access Indian Penal Code,1860 entire Bare Act absolutely free by clicking Demo > III.Criminal & Motor Accident Laws heading > 4.Indian Penal Code,1860.\n For the remaining 70 Acts pls buy and enter the Activation code to access all the contents. The activation code cost Rs.400. Its a one time charge to access all the 71 Acts. \nFor more details you can contact our customer care executive @ +91 8754542929 from 10 a.m to 6 p.m.
If you are interested and willing to pay the Activation code charge Rs.400 please follow the procedure given below to activate the application:

• Click Get Activation Code option.

• Click 'OK' to allow the application to send text message, it sends request for activation code from your mobile to the App. provider.

• Then our Marketing representative or Customer Care Officer will Contact you and send the Activation code by SMS or email.

• Enter the provided Code in Enter activation code option and press Activate. Happy access all Acts.
BY ADVOCATES; TO THE LEGAL FRATERNITY.
